text:
@Acosta Why 6 feet? WHO: "Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and others. Why? When someone coughs, sneezes, or speaks they spray small liquid droplets from their nose or mouth which may contain virus."

Covid-19 droplets are so small they can penetrate masks.
